Salah satu kelebihan bursa saham US yg tidak bisa ditandingi oleh bursa saham manapun apalagi BEI adalah berlimpahnya perusahaan2 teknologi kualitas papan atas, ga sulit untuk mencari saham bagus disini, malah kita yg akan kebingungan karena terlalu banyak pilihan saham yg bagus.  

Bagi kamu yg mau mulai invest & trading di saham US (Tesla, Google, Amazon, Apple, Starbuck, Nike, dll) bisa pakai Gotrade dan masukan invite token "210798" saat daftar, karena untuk daftar di Gotrade harus ada orang yg ngasih kamu invite token dulu, kalo engga kamu ga bisa daftar atau proses pendaftarannya bakal lama banget. Kamu juga bisa bagikan invite token tersebut ke temenmu yg lainnya yaa.

Soal Fren-R ya hukum demand supply yg bekerja. R yg diissued hanya sedikit 52:1, sementara rasio R dan W itu 5:79, pasti ritel incar waran jadi mesti tebus R nya atau yg lebih greedy lagi akan beli R nya di pasar tunai.

Karena PSP ga punya kepentingan tebus R, maka R miliknya akan dijual.
Supaya demand vs supplynya sesuai keinginan PSP, maka harga R dikerek setinggi mungkin dan mereka akan lepas R nya di harga tinggi. Trendnya akan menurun sampai hari akhir trading R, itu pasti.

Pertempuram berikutnya nanti di trading Warannya. Semua yg punya Waran akan berharap jual di harga lumayan. Mungkin >20. Nah pertanyaannya siapa yg mau beli Warannya?

Saran saja buat ritel yg masih pegang R atau akan tebus R: be quick in your decision making, jangan terlalu lama karena yg terakhir pasti yg paling rugi.
Ingat zero sum game ya.

Right Issue merupakan hak memesan efek terlebih dahulu yang dibagikan oleh Emiten kepada para Pemegang Saham dalam rangka Aksi Korporasi Perusahaan. Bapak/Ibu yang memperoleh
Hak (Right) tersebut dapat menebusnya untuk menjadi saham induk atau bisa juga dijual saja.

Adapun perdagangan (transaksi jual beli) Right mengikuti periode perdagangan Right, dan dilakukan di Pasar Tunai pada sesi 1, untuk itu apabila Bapak/Ibu bermaksud menjual Hak (Right) tersebut, silahkan menghubungi Dealer kami di no 021-57 900 909 atau melalui Sales/Cabang kami.

Sedangkan untuk menebus Right tersedia menu Exercise di aplikasi mobile phone (POEMS ID)

Jika ingin dijual harus melalui dealing kami 02157900909. Jika ingin ditebus dapat melalui aplikasi dan akses menu exercise

BMRI 1Q21: results within our expectation.
Bahana

BMRI reported a 1Q21 net profit of IDR5.9tn (-25.2% YoY, +91.4% QoQ), which came in-line with our expectations (24.3% of our full-year forecast) and the consensus (24.8%). 

NII was up by 12.5% YoY in 1Q21, as loan yield started to stabilize as some payment from Covid-19 restructured debtors had been received in 1Q21 to support the interest income, while CoF continued to decrease by 23bps QoQ, which resulted in NIM improvement in 1Q21 (5.1%) vs. 4.6% in previous quarter.

In terms of loan growth, BMRI was able to book 9.1% YoY growth in 1Q21 partly contributed by the Bank Syariah Integration (BSI) to Mandiri.  

The outstanding of covid-19 restructured loan reached IDR94.5tn in 1Q21, down from IDR123.4tn as of Dec-20. Around 11% fall into high risk criteria which indicates that they have risk to be downgraded to NPL after restructuring period is over. It is worth noting that until 1Q21, only 0.9% (IDR880bn) of the covid-19 restructured portfolio has been downgraded to NPL.
CLSA : Indonesia Infrastructure  (UPGRADE)

  Sovereign Wealth Fund and toll-road divestment updateThe infrastructure sector is a potential highlight in 2021, thanks to Indonesia sSovereign Wealth Fund (SWF), which could improve infrastructure activity. This isparticularly promising for toll roads, which had growing interest from private andforeign investors before the pandemic. Contractors and toll-road operators haveexpressed plans to divest, which could boost cash flows and further toll-roaddevelopment. However, execution remains key.   

  SWF progress 

 Formation of Indonesia s first SWF is progressing. Following the appointments of asupervisory board and a board of directors, the newly formed entity - the IndonesiaInvestment Authority, or INA - is expected to begin operations soon. 
The program has attracted a number of foreign investors (from government-to government, or G2G, relationships) such as the United Arab Emirates (US$10bn). 
Finance Minister Sri Mulyani hopes to attract US$20bn (Rp300tn) of SWF investment:35% from Indonesia s government and the rest from foreign investors.   


The SWF should spur infrastructure investment, particularly for toll roads. Executionwill be a key area to watch.  Wijaya Karya (BUY) is our top sector pick. We reiterate a BUY rating and an Rp5,350target price for Jasa Marga. We reiterate a PP Outperform rating and upgrade WaskitaKarya from Underperform to Outperform as expected toll-road divestment beneficiaries.We roll forward forecasts to 2023 and tweak 2022 earnings estimates down 3.2% to up2%.

 Adjusting PB-based target prices for Wijaya Karya Rp1,850 , PTPP Rp1,450 and Waskita Karya Rp1,150.  

  Key Beneficiaries   SOE contractors and toll-road operatorsSOE contractors Wijaya Karya, PP, Waskita Karya, Adhi Karya, and Hutama Karyaand toll-road operator Jasa Marga reportedly plan to divest toll roads via the SWFprogram. We estimate up to Rp100tn of toll-road divestment assuming all stakesare sold, with more assets from Jasa Marga, Waskita Karya and Wijaya Karya.Proceeds are to be used for debt payment or build new project.
